key_risks: Interest rate sensitivity impacting mortgage-backed securities and borrowing costs
Regulatory risks from changes in housing finance and tax laws
Credit risk from non-performing loans in business purpose lending
Economic uncertainty due to inflation, unemployment, and housing market trends
Intense market competition from private-label securitizers and government-sponsored entities
controversies: Regulatory scrutiny over private-label securitization and compliance with the Investment Company Act
Concerns about housing affordability due to focus on investor-owned properties
social_issues: Impact on housing affordability due to focus on single-family rentals and fix-and-flip projects
governance_issues: Complex compliance requirements with SEC and IRS regulations

sources.title: Redwood Trust, Inc. Company Profile - Dun & Bradstreet
sources.snippet: Company Description: Redwood Trust is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that finances, manages, and invests in residential real estate mortgages and securities backed by such loans.
